page.title: 17EVENTS
page.content: These are some of the events that have taken place in our area during the past 20_25 years. QUY 1964__The railway closed. 1978__The village school closed and the Elms in The Avenue were felled because they got Dutch Elm Disease. 1979/80__The bypass was opened and the approach road to Quy was altered. 1981__The old village hall was closed and the old school was converted into the new village hall at a cost of Â£30,531. BOTTISHAM The Anchor and the Golden Ball closed. The chapel became the Scout hut.The College pool opened,then was covered _with local donations and fund raising.The library opened.A new housing estate and a restaurant opened
